title: Incomedia WebSite X5 v8.0.0.16 Multilingual & Key
description:
Incomedia WebSite X5 v8.0.0.16 Multilingual & Key

--------
English:
--------
Category: Progam
Language: Spanish from Spain Multilanguage Included
OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Included Medicine

Description
Create your website in just 5 steps

No programming knowledge required
More than 1000 templates ready for use
Creating shopping cart e-commerce
Forms, Feed RSS, Reserved area, multi-language sites
Sites compatible with all major browsers
Sites navigable from mobile phones
XHTML code optimized search engine
Compatible with Windows Vista
 

Features
What is it?
WebSite X5 is a completely visual and intuitive structured way which guides you step by step through the process. In just 5 steps you can create, update and publish their websites and online shops with totally professional look and feel.

Why is it so simple to use?
No programming skills required.
Procedures Guide for the creation of sites: at each step only the orders are needed.
Gallery of over 500 templates and graphics ready for use.
Online guide, available also in PDF and video tutorials.

Who can use?
Private associations and clubs who want a pleasant and creative software for Web sites and photo albums.
For companies that need a professional software to create their websites and online shops.
For Web designers who want a complete and versatile software to produce Web sites that present your customers.
For public bodies and Schools who need an easy solution to create their Web sites.

Why is it powerful?
It has no boundaries. Insert as many pages need to build your website and how many websites you want.
Includes a prescribed format e-commerce sites (e-commerce) for credit card payments, 3D button editor (three dimensions), FTP engine, tools for the creation of reserved areas, Feed RSS and the option to submit your site in different languages.
Graphic editor to touch up images with the application of filters, frames and masks.
Creating sites in XHTML, compatible with all major browsers, navigable from mobile phones and indexed by search engines
